short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save images and video to your Campfire boards.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Campfire Save extension lets you save images and video you find around the web to your Campfire board. 

Just right click to save images or video from anywhere online. Because every site online is built different saving from right click might not be accessible, when you're having trouble accessing the image, click the extension archive and a list of every available photo and video will be accessible and ready to share.

0.0.0.1 is our initial version and there will be updates as we grow. We hope you enjoy this extension. Feel free to leave comments on how we can improve our product for your best user experience.
